text:
="preserve">Woodstock '94 was a music festival. It was organized in 1994 to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the original Woodstock festival of 1969.
The 1994 concert was scheduled for Saturday, August 13 and Sunday, August 14. The third day, Friday, August 12, was added later. But the weather was rainy that weekend. By that Saturday, much of the field had turned to mud.
The event happened in Saugerties, New York. More than 500,000 people attended the festival.
